content: FREE RAFFLE 1HoDLCLUB DIY EDITIONHi everybody ! I hope that you all are fine ! As I said, I will try to make Free raffles with each collection!As you know the latest 1HoDLCLUB collection is the DIY collection which includes 3 different coins! here is the raffle for the first piece of the collection!Here are 5 1HoDLCLUB Silver Plated DIY coins ! there will be 1 block per coin! 1 winner per block!the serial numbers will be random! each lot will come with a PEPE Patch! RULES- Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)- Requirements: Jr Member and up . Below Jr Member you can participate if you have a 1HoDLCLUB collectibles or Copper Membership- Last number of the hash of that block i choose will be the winner. [1 block per coin]- shipping fees : Paid by winner (You know it's bear market )- This is a post for free raffle, if you have any off-topic or non-free raffle questions, please ask them in PM and not in this post.LIST:00 - Est201301 - GazetaBitcoin02 - Crytocanuk03 - Fattcatt04 - BTCLiz05 - 5tift06 - Steeley07 - Abiky08 - xLays09 - Real-Duke10 - The_Crypto_Kid11 - sam0012 - mx12.levins13 - geophphreigh14 - bestcoin_5915 - pinky123416 - slimzak17 - Honeybadger201418 - Bullion-n-BTC19 - hanspeter7720 - Streissi21 - Remsjack22 - heisty23 - 2stout24 - 1miau25 - Fattcatt26 - mole081527 - tldr-hodl28 - Mbitr29 - Dustin westerbeck30 - Koal-8431 - Timelord206732 - Jambo USA33 - ZipReg34 - examplens35 - rhomelmabini36 - YodasRedRocket37 - Dernoste38 - bitcoiner24h39 - Suzuki Matt40 - krogothmanhattan41 - Iced42 - tweetious43 - cygan44 - Otillio133045 - TxCryptoKid46 - NeuroticFish47 - phishead48 - hotdog749 - Humble Bitcoiners50 - minerjones51 - buckrogers52 - aoluain53 - Fundamentals Of54 - turbodogma55 - Mauser56 - PeakDK57 - lebnor58 - bitbollo59 - PreciousMetapsICT60 - Hookzup161 - dozerz62 - nullama63 - -doubleU-64 - sunnybwoy65 - mv198666 - sweeteye67 - Amax1668 - saxydev69 - doblezero70 - Markzellers71 - inelasticsupply72 - BTCOVERFIATS73 - jwinterm74 - willi997475 - bct_ail76 - MoparMiningLLC77 - sheenshane78 - MrMojoRising2679 - Pmalek80 - PawGo81 - CoinageMint82 - CARIBBEAN_TREASURES83 - haloxon84 - klaaas85 - PereMaboule 86 - bullrun2020bro87 - Frank AlpenCoin88 - Buchi-8889 - polymerbit90 - sweeteye91 - Cryptogreatdane92 - Kryptowerk93 - xSlyy94 - garciaor200295 - ithd196 - HeRetiK97 - Darker4598 - DirtyBirdE99 - JanEmilGood luck to Everybody !
